description: This creamy veal and mushroom pappardelle makes an elegant dinner party dish.
name: Veal & Mushroom Pappardelle Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pappardelle according to pack instructions, drain and divide between 4 bowls. Pour the cream into the pan, add the escalopes and juices and cook for 1 minute to warm through. Serve the veal on a bed of pappardelle.
